data.title: Sergei Gerasimov: 40 let tvorcheskoi deiatelnosti. Katalog vystavki [40 Years of Creative Endeavors: The Exhibition Catalog of Sergey Gerasimov]: Textual wrappers (1945)
data.meta_description: Textual wrappers - Directorate of Art Exhibitions and Panoramas, Moscow - 1945 - 17 x 12.5 cm. 12 pages: 4 black and white plates. One of 500 copies. Text in Russian. Very good copy. This monograph delves into the captivating world of Sergey Vasilyevich Gerasimov (1885-1964), a prominent Soviet and Russian painter whose artistic journey is a testament to his evolution as an artist. As a student of the renowned Konstantin Korovin, Gerasimov inherited a legacy of artistic excellence, which he would go on to shape and transform in his own unique way. - Sergei Gerasimov: 40 let tvorcheskoi deiatelnosti. Katalog vystavki [40 Years of Creative Endeavors: The Exhibition Catalog of Sergey Gerasimov]
